properties.areaDesc: Daviess, KY; Vanderburgh, IN; Henderson, KY; Posey, IN; Warrick, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 10:27AM CST until February 22 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a
flood warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...

Ohio River at Owensboro and Evansville

.With additionsal rainfall expected, water levels will continue to rise
along the entire Ohio River basin from Newburgh Dam Indiana all the way
down to Cairo llinois. Minor flooding is now expected to occur at
Owensboro and Evansville.

The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Ohio River at Evansville.
* from Sunday afternoon to Saturday February 22.
* At 10:00 AM Wednesday the stage was 37.0 feet.
* Flood Stage is 42.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Sunday afternoon and continue
to rise to near 42.8 feet by Thursday morning.
* Impact...At 42.0 Feet...The river is 3300 feet wide.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
